text.description:
Eating at some of the top restaurants in Las Vegas to start off 2023! In this video we try Gordon Ramsay Burger at the Planet Hollywood, Lotus of Siam, The Paleta Bar, Aloha Specialties, among other great food. These are some of my favorite and some of the best restaurants I tried in Las Vegas for 2023. We went all over Las Vegas from the strip, to Downtown Las Vegas, and Shanghai Plaza Chinatown for this food tour.
Cuts Clothing link: https://cuts.team/ Code: DVW10
The Paleta Bar Address: 4258 Spring Mountain Rd Suite 101, Las Vegas, NV 89102
Guest: @lasvegasmimi
--------------------------------------- *My Filming Gear (These are Affiliate Links):
Main Camera : https://amzn.to/3mBZavh Main Lens : https://amzn.to/3DhUqkt Other Main Camera: https://amzn.to/3ymiqPv Shotgun Mic: https://amzn.to/2XLRxbd Vlogging Tripod: https://amzn.to/2WgVq7T
*SUPPPORT The Channel: Membership Join: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHqnkn5DJbKuKznm7MIDfHg/join
Paypal Donations: https://paypal.me/danvsworld?locale.x=en_US
Buy MERCH: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHqnkn5DJbKuKznm7MIDfHg/store
*FOLLOW Social :
https://www.instagram.com/danvsworld__/?hl=en (@danvsworld_) #lasvegas #vegas #lasvegasfood
text.fulltitle: The BEST Restaurants To Try In Las Vegas!
